mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, pass, email, zipcode, address1, address2, phone, email_get, join_date, role) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{zipcode},#{address1}, #{address2}, #{phone}, #{emailGet}, SYSDATE(), #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT pass FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pass=#{pass}, email=#{email}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2}, phone=#{phone}, email_get=#{emailGet}, join_date=SYSDATE() WHERE userNo = #{userNo}
